channel.title: Looking for 2 EXPIERENCED java developers
channel.description:
Hi
We are looking for 2 expierenced java developers that are able to code and maintain a rsps efficiently.
Your profile:
-Available 5-6 days a week -17+ years old (if 16 in the year you become 17 you can participate as well) -Friendly -Good in working with other people -English, Dutch (We prefer dutch) -High knowledge of java
We are gonna ask you to show some of your work on the hand of projects you already made or helped with. If we decide to hire you as 1 of the 2 open spots you will be granted permission to access a vps and get site priveleges on the hand of a rank. You will get payed on the hand of donations later in your career. We want to highlight that we only want people that work hard and without making a mess. We certainly agree that everyone makes mistakes it is only a part of us that makes us human so you wont get fired instantly. If you got several warnings and still make a mess or whatever you did wrong you will get fired immediately. We are also a fun community and work together like friends we certainly like to make a good laugh with each other and just chill some times. We listen to other members for ideas and possible content to make the server a succes so the server can be player based also feel free to bring your own ideas to our ears we would love to hear what you think would be awesome to add. If you are interested in this job you can contact us on skype: ignace_de_sutter and roy.beek100
Spots:
Site manager: taken Graphical designer: taken Developer: N/A Developer: N/A Assist developer: taken
We hope to see you aboard!
Kind regards, Runeforce.

item.title: Looking for 2 EXPIERENCED java developers
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

sertan8:

17 years old? lol really?

I used to require 18+ unless you showed you had good qualifications and you were mature. It’s totally understandable. Younger people tend to be more immature, and in conflict an immature person (no matter the age) will most likely do something reckless. That, and kids can be annoying.

I know how to write a class, does that make me qualified?

[code=java]
package com.main;

public class AClassForLolz {

 public static void main(String[] args) {
      // Do main stuff here yo
 }

}[/code]

OP: You give literally no info about your project. You just say you need people for it. What’s the base? the client? The ideals behind it? the point of the project?

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for 2 EXPIERENCED java developers

item.title: Looking for 2 EXPIERENCED java developers
item.dc:creator: @RuneForceGame RuneForceGame
item.description:
@RuneForceGame wrote:

Hi

We are looking for 2 expierenced java developers that are able to code and maintain a rsps efficiently.

Your profile:

-Available 5-6 days a week
-17+ years old (if 16 in the year you become 17 you can participate as well)
-Friendly
-Good in working with other people
-English, Dutch (We prefer dutch)
-High knowledge of java

We are gonna ask you to show some of your work on the hand of projects you already made or helped with.
If we decide to hire you as 1 of the 2 open spots you will be granted permission to access a vps and get site priveleges on the hand of a rank.
You will get payed on the hand of donations later in your career.
We want to highlight that we only want people that work hard and without making a mess. We certainly agree that everyone makes mistakes it is only a part of us that makes us human so you wont get fired instantly. If you got several warnings and still make a mess or whatever you did wrong you will get fired immediately. We are also a fun community and work together like friends we certainly like to make a good laugh with each other and just chill some times. We listen to other members for ideas and possible content to make the server a succes so the server can be player based also feel free to bring your own ideas to our ears we would love to hear what you think would be awesome to add. If you are interested in this job you can contact us on skype: ignace_de_sutter and roy.beek100

Spots:

Site manager: taken
Graphical designer: taken
Developer: N/A
Developer: N/A
Assist developer: taken

We hope to see you aboard!

Kind regards, Runeforce.
